title: Starbucks Greener Cup Timeline - Starbucks Stories
body: Announces commitment to eliminate plastic straws globally by 2020 and launches innovative strawless lid for cold beverages. 2015. Completes global rollout of new cup sleeves, which are made from less paper and more post-consumer fiber. 2013. Offers a $1 reusable cup in the U.S. and Canada, and a £1 cup in the United Kingdom to help reduce cup ...
